GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article with the specified article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments with specified article id

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the new comment created from the username and body given

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article with the specified article id increasing or decreasing by the given amount

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
